model

Class Facet

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Facet

  • public class Facet
extends java.lang.Object
    the class 'Facet' encapsulates the various parameters for each facet; as well as the various methods required
    Version:
    %v..%
    Author:
    ralph
    See Also:
    model.Facet

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Boolean bAsterisk
      Boolean exclusive, marking the facet for which a carriage return in the data file occurs.
      private java.lang.Boolean bFixed
      For D-Studies, differentiates between 'Fixed' and 'Random' facets.
      private java.lang.Boolean bIsNested
      Boolean, indicating whether facet is nested or crossed
      private char cDesignation
      cDesignation formal, symbolic name of facet
      private char cFacetType
      'x' - not specified 'd' - Differentiation 's' - Stratification 'g' - Generalization 'f' - Fixed
      private java.lang.Character cNestor
      the designation char for the facet in which this facet is nested.
      private java.lang.Double dFacetLevel
      'Average' sample size for variance coefficients calculation.
      private int iNestingRank
      depth of nesting
      private java.lang.Integer iOrder
      Hierarchical order of facet in sHDictionary
      private Nest myNest
      Pointer to 'Nest' for access to design parameters stored.
      private SampleSizeTree myTree
      Pointer to 'SampleSizeTree' for access to sample size data.
      private java.lang.String sName
      sName descriptive Name of facet.
      private java.lang.String sNestees
      'Nestees' are the facets nested in the current facet.

      Setter of FacetLevel (Double).
      void setFacetLevel()
      Calculates levels for G studies for facets of generalization: simple mean of sample sizes for 1 level of nesting, harmoniv mean for higher levels of nesting.

    • Field Detail

      • sName

        private java.lang.String sName
        sName descriptive Name of facet.

      • cDesignation

        private char cDesignation
        cDesignation formal, symbolic name of facet

      • bIsNested

        private java.lang.Boolean bIsNested
        Boolean, indicating whether facet is nested or crossed

      • bAsterisk

        private java.lang.Boolean bAsterisk
        Boolean exclusive, marking the facet for which a carriage return in the data file occurs.

      • iOrder

        private java.lang.Integer iOrder
        Hierarchical order of facet in sHDictionary

      • cFacetType

        private char cFacetType
        'x' - not specified 'd' - Differentiation 's' - Stratification 'g' - Generalization 'f' - Fixed

      • cNestor

        private java.lang.Character cNestor
        the designation char for the facet in which this facet is nested. The default is '$' which indicates a crossed facets, i.e. facets without a 'Nestor'

      • iNestingRank

        private int iNestingRank
        depth of nesting

      • sNestees

        private java.lang.String sNestees
        'Nestees' are the facets nested in the current facet. Since multiple facets can be nested within the current facet, they form a string of facet designations (char)

      • dFacetLevel

        private java.lang.Double dFacetLevel
        'Average' sample size for variance coefficients calculation.

      • myNest

        private Nest myNest
        Pointer to 'Nest' for access to design parameters stored.

      • bFixed

        private java.lang.Boolean bFixed
        For D-Studies, differentiates between 'Fixed' and 'Random' facets.

      • myTree

        private SampleSizeTree myTree
        Pointer to 'SampleSizeTree' for access to sample size data.

        Setter of 'Nestor', i.e. the facet in which the current facet is nested.

      • setFacetType

        public void setFacetType(char _cFacetType)
        Setter of 'facetType', defined above in the variable list. The facet type is essential for the calculation of variance components and G-coefficients.
        Parameters:
        _cFacetType; -

      • setFacetLevel

        public void setFacetLevel()
        Calculates levels for G studies for facets of generalization: simple mean of sample sizes for 1 level of nesting, harmoniv mean for higher levels of nesting.
